product_name: Shimano SLX SM-RT66 Disc Brake Rotor - 160mm / 180mm
long_description: This Shimano SLX SM-RT66 disc brake rotor supplies powerful braking at a great value, whether you're replacing an old rotor or upgrading your current ride. Strong steel rotor offers durability and responsive braking. The Shimano SLX SM-RT66 6-bolt disc rotor is sold as an individual rotor (with mounting bolts); not compatible with Center Lock hubs.
short_description: This Shimano SLX SM-RT66 disc brake rotor supplies powerful braking at a great value, whether you're replacing an old rotor or upgrading your current ride.
